name: Adelphi University
highlights: Located in Garden City, N.Y.
Individual student attention - 10:1 Student faculty ratio
Ranked in the top 10% in the USA
Alumni network of 90,000+
mainline: With 50+ academic areas of study and hundreds of on-campus resources, Adelphi University has a well-established reputation for academic excellence.

name: Alliant International University
highlights: Alliant International University-a leader in global education
Prepares students to enter professional careers
Has produced 45,000 alumni across the globe
Regionally accredited by the WASC
mainline: Alliant International University operates nine campuses in four countries and is home to international students from 75+ countries.

name: American University
highlights: AU- 1 of the top-ranked universities in the USA
Welcomes 1,370+ international students from 129 countries
200+ clubs with everything from language to sports to dance
John F. Kennedy & Barack Obama have spoken on campus
mainline: Nine out of ten AU graduates have landed jobs in their desired fields, enrolled in graduate school, or both, within 6 months of graduation.

name: Arkansas State University
highlights: Marked its centennial year in 2009
The international student population is 7.5%
Have represented over 68 countries
90 percent of the students receive financial aid

name: Auburn University
highlights: Based in 1 of the “Best Small Places for Business & Careers”
12 colleges and schools and nationally ranked programs
Year round activities on campus for students to enjoy
Based in Auburn- among Top 10 Best places to live
mainline: Employers recruit Auburn graduates for their edge with their level of professionalism, communication skills, and employability.
